title: Knife, 17th century
markings: On blade: partial mark, M or W
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Wide steel blade, slightly up-curved lower edge, angled end, pointed. Tang with button end. Handle eight-sided. Brass scales on major plane engraved with wriggle work; four sides of bone; two exposed tang sides. Handle end with 24 laminated sections of tri-color horn and brass plates. Plain brass end.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, 17th century.
17th century. Steel, brass, horn, bone. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-11.
